<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eagle Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=3265) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 139</row>

**Archetype** [Sniping Duo](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=121)

**Prerequisites**
[Sniping Duo Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3258)

</column>

---

You and your spotter are adept at watching out for one another. As long as you can see or hear each other, neither of you is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), or flanking creatures of your level or lower, or to creatures of your level or lower using a surprise attack. However, they can still help their allies flank.
name: Eagle Eyes
